content:
Diagnosis
	1. Medullary thyroid carcinoma with brain and bone metastases
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Palliative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Total thyroidectomy and central neck dissection

	Systemic therapy
	1 Mar 2024 Commenced Cabozantinib 60mg daily
	15 Apr 2024 Dose reduction to 40mg daily due to grade 3 palmar-plantar syndrome

	Radiotherapy
	20 Mar 2024 Whole brain radiotherapy 20Gy in 5 fractions
	10 Apr 2024 Palliative radiotherapy to T7 vertebra 8Gy single fraction

	Current disease status
	Progressive disease with worsening symptoms

	Current issues
	1. Deteriorating mobility
	2. Increasing bone pain
	3. Grade 2 fatigue
	4. Intermittent headaches

	Summary of consultation
	Unfortunately [redacted name] has experienced significant clinical deterioration over the past 4 weeks. Despite initial disease stabilization with Cabozantinib, recent imaging shows progressive disease with new bone metastases and enlarging brain metastases. Her mobility has declined significantly, now requiring a wheelchair for most activities. She reports worsening bone pain, particularly in her thoracic spine and left hip, despite regular opioid analgesia. Calcitonin has risen from 2400 to 3000 pg/mL and CEA from 150 to 200 ng/mL over the past month.

On examination today, she appears notably more frail with ECOG performance status deteriorating to 3. There is marked tenderness over the thoracic spine and left hip. Neurological examination shows new mild right-sided weakness, though she remains cognitively intact.

	Further investigations
	MRI brain with contrast - urgent
	CT chest/abdomen/pelvis with bone windows
	Calcitonin and CEA levels

	Medication changes
	Oxycodone modified release increased to 40mg BD
	Dexamethasone commenced 4mg BD

	Follow up
	Urgent palliative care review arranged
	Next oncology review in 1 week with scan results

	Required actions
	1. Urgent MRI brain to assess progression
	2. Consider further palliative radiotherapy pending MRI results
	3. Discussion at next available thyroid MDT regarding systemic therapy options
	4. District nurse referral for support with mobility
